% of the Total funds you receive: % du total des fonds que vous recevez

Are you sure you want to cancel the sche: Are you sure you want to cancel the scheduled validation?
Attend every validation to get a higher: Attend every validation to get a higher reward

Can not be used for validation: Can not be used for validation

Can not schedule the training validation. Another validation is already requested.

Ne peut démarrer la session de validation car vous n'avez pas soumis de flips.
Come back again to participate in the ne: Come back again to participate in the next validation session.

Create a new password to export your pri: Créez un nouveau mot de passe pour exporter votre clé privée
Create password to encrypt your account: Create password to encrypt your account
Declare the winner and pay rewards to or: Déclarer le gagnant et payer les récompenses aux oracles.
Deleted flip will be moved to the drafts: Les flips supprimés vont être déplacés dans les brouillons.
Deposit will be refunded if your vote ma: Le dépot sera restitué si votre vote correspond à celui de la majorité
Enter amount to confirm transfer: Insérer le montant pour confirmer le transfert
Enter an invitation code to get a free s: Enter an invitation code to get a free shared node connection

Entered amount does not match target amo: Le montant entré ne correspond pas au montant prévu
Find an invitation code and activate it: Find an invitation code and activate it as soon as possible. Invitation code expires in 5 minutes before validation.
Finish voting and refund oracles with th: Terminer le vote et restituer les fonds verouillés aux oracles.
Flip has been saved to drafts: Le flip a été sauvegardé dans les brouillons

Great job! You have earned maximum rewar: Great job! You have earned maximum reward
I understand that Idena cannot recover t: I understand that Idena cannot recover the private key for me.
I understand the risk of compromising my: I understand the risk of compromising my private key backup.
Idena supports only one active tab with: Idena supports only one active tab with the app. Please reload this page to continue using this tab or close it.
Idena training validation is in progress: Idena training validation is in progress
Idena training validation will start soo: Idena training validation will start soon
Idena validation is by invitation only. Invitations are distributed by validated people.
Import your private key backup to sign i: Import your private key backup to sign in
Including a share of minority voters' de: Incluant une part du dépot des voteurs minoritaires
Including your Voting deposit: y compris votre dépot de vote
Invite your friends and help them to pas: Invite your friends and help them to pass the first 3 validations
Is the flip correct?: Est-ce que le flip est correct ?
Join the mining of the first human-centr: Join the mining of the first human-centric cryptocurrency
Key or password is invalid. Try again.
Learn about the validation process and g: Learn about the validation process and get a certificate. You can provide it as a proof to a validated person to get an invitation code.
Links are not allowed in voting options. Please use Description for links.
Make a photo of QR code or save your enc: Make a photo of QR code or save your encrypted private key.
Make sure it is not possible to read the: Vérifiez bien qu’il n’est pas possible d’identifier une histoire qui a du sens dans les images mélangées
Make sure you have the private key backu: Make sure you have the private key backup. Otherwise you will lose access to your account.
Motivate your audience to join and help: Motivate your audience to join and help them to get an invite

MyIdenaBot reminds you about important actions based on your
              identity status:
Pas de données disponibles. Sautez ce flip SVP.
No voting deposit for oracles: Pas de dépot pour voter pour les oracles
Node operator provides you the shared no: Node operator provides you the shared node for the upcoming validation ceremony
Now solve bunch of flips to check its qu: Maintenant, résolvez une série de flips pour déterminer leur qualité. Le flip est qualifié si la majorité, représentant plus de 2/3 des participants donne la même réponse.
One of the keywords is not clearly visib: One of the keywords is not clearly visible in the story
Open in blockchain explorer: Ouvrir sur l'explorer de la blockchain
Oracles can vote for any option. Rewards: Oracles can vote for any option. Rewards will be paid to everyone regardless of the outcome of the vote.
Oracles who vote against the majority ar: Oracles who vote against the majority are penalized. Voting will be started in a future date.
Period when secret votes are getting pub: Délai quand les votes secrets sont publiés et les résultats comptés
Please choose the platform where you hav: Please choose the platform where you have the most active account:
Please confirm that you want to use your: Merci de confirmer que vous souhaitez utiliser votre adresse publique pour vous identifier sur le site
Please connect to a shared node: Please connect to a shared node
Please correct form fields: Corrigez les champs du formulaire svp
Please do not use the API key on multipl: Please do not use the API key on multiple devices at the same time as this will cause the validation failure.
Please enter your identity address to co: Merci d'entrer l'adresse de votre identité pour confirmer la termination. Votre stake sera transféré à l'adresse de l'identité.
Please read the rules carefully. You can: Please read the rules carefully. You can lose all your validation rewards if any of your flips is reported.
Please remove Report status from some ot: Enlevez svp le Report de quelques flips pour continuer
Soumettez {{remainingRequiredFlips}} les flips requis s'il vous plaît.
Please wait. The network is reaching con: Please wait. The network is reaching consensus on validated identities
Prepare yourself for the validation cere: Prepare yourself for the validation ceremony. Pass the training validation and get your training validation certificate. It will help you to get an invitation code.
Prolong the voting in order to select a: Prolonger le vote afin de sélectionner un nouveau comité de vote
Read carefully \"What is a bad flip\" ru:
Read carefully "What is a bad flip" rules to avoid
                      penalty.
Refunded when voting in majority and los: Remboursé quand le vote est majoritaire et perdu quand le vote est minoritaire
Remind them about the validation ceremon: Remind them about the validation ceremony and help them get validated
Remove private key from this device: Remove private key from this device
Report all flips that break the rules: Report all flips that break the rules
Report bad flips and get rewarded if the: Report bad flips and get rewarded if these flips are reported by more than 50% of other participants
Report bad flips and get rewarded if these flips are reported by more that 50% of other participants.
Rewards for submitted and qualified flip: Rewards for submitted and qualified flips
Rewards will be paid to Oracles: Les récompenses seront payés aux Oracles
Save the encrypted key on this device: Save the encrypted key on this device
Scan QR by your mobile phone or copy cod: Scannez le QR avec votre téléphone ou copiez le code ci-dessous pour exporter votre clé privée
Scan QR by your mobile phone.
Schedule your next training validation a: Schedule your next training validation and join exactly on time.
Scheduled transaction is about to be sen: Scheduled transaction is about to be sent ({{index}} of {{total}})
See the full report in blockchain explor: See the full report in blockchain explorer
Select 4 images to tell your story: Sélectionnez 4 images qui racontent votre histoire
Select meaningful story: left or right: Choisissez l'histoire qui fait sens : gauche ou droite
Shuffle images in order to make a nonsen: Mélangez les images afin de créer une séquence d’images sans aucun sens
Sign in into your account 15 mins before: Sign in into your account 15 mins before the validation starts.
Solve the flips quickly when validation: Résolvez les flips rapidement quand la validation commence. Les 6 premiers flips doivent être soumis en moins de deux minutes.
Some of the Idena users can not not read: Some of the Idena users can not not read your the text in your local language
Start with the training validation and g: Start with the training validation and get a certificate which proves that you are prepared for the real validation. Then you can use your certificate to apply for an invitation.
Submit the form to deactivate your deleg: Submit the form to deactivate your delegation status.
Submit the form to deactivate your minin: Submit the form to deactivate your mining status. You can activate it again afterwards.
Subscribe to @MyIdenaBot to get personal:
Subscribe to @MyIdenaBot to get personalized notifications based on
        your status
Terminate the contract to clean-up its s: Terminer le contrat pour clarifier son état et restituer 50% du stake au propriétaire
Terminate your identity and withdraw the: Terminez votre identité et retirez votre stake. Le statut de votre identité sera réinitialisé à « Non validé ».
Text necessary to read to solve the flip: Text necessary to read to solve the flip
The amount is larger than your balance: Le montant est plus grand que votre balance
The minimum share of the votes which an: La part minimum de votes qu'une option requiert avant qu'il devienne le résultat final du vote
The number of randomly selected oracles: Le nombre d'oracles sélectionnés aléatoirement autorisés à voter
The program allows you to earn rewards f: The program allows you to earn rewards for new validated identities you bring to the network.
The screen you were looking for doesn’t: The screen you were looking for doesn’t exist.
The share of Oracle committee sufficient: La part du comité Oracle nécessaire pour déterminer le résultat du vote
The shared node access is restricted. Yo: The shared node access is restricted. You cannot use the node for the upcoming validation ceremony.
There are no votings for you: Il n'y a pas de votes pour vous
There are no votings for you because you: Il n'y a pas de votes pour vous car votre statut n'est pas validé.
Il n'y a pas de votes en cours pour le moment.
There are numbers or letters indicating: There are numbers or letters indicating the order
There is a sequence of enumerated object: There is a sequence of enumerated objects
There is text that is necessary to read: There is text that is necessary to read to solve the flip
The time must be synchronized with inter: The time must be synchronized with internet time
Think up a short story about someone/som: Imaginez une courte histoire à propos de quelqu’un ou quelque chose en lien avec les deux mots-clés ci-dessous, conformément au modèle short Avant – Evénement - Après
This action is irreversible. Scheduled t: This action is irreversible. Scheduled transaction will be deleted.
This vote is not available to you. Only: Ce vote n'est pas disponible pour vous. Seules les identités validées sélectionnées aléatoirement par le comité peuvent voter.
Title: Titre
To activate mining status please downloa: To activate mining status please download the desktop version of Idena app
To become a validator of Idena blockchai: To become a validator of Idena blockchain you can activate your mining status. Keep your node online to mine iDNA coins.
To get a reward for the voting you must: Pour obtenir une récompense pour le vote vous devez être en ligne au moins une fois durant la période du décompte du vote
To minimize the probability of a Sybil a: To minimize the probability of a Sybil attack, the pace of network growth is restricted: Idena network participation is invitation-based. New invitations can be sent out only by validated users. The number of invitations is limited and increases as the network grows.
To take part in the validation, you need: To take part in the validation, you need an invitation code. Invitations can be provided by validated identities.
Total funds locked during the voting and: Les financements totaux verouillés durant le vote et payés aux oracles et au propriétaire ensuite
Total score for the last 10 validations: Total score for the last 10 validations
Train your time management skills. Valid: Train your time management skills. Validation requires participants to join exactly on time.
Type your search in the box above to fin: Tapez votre recherche ci-dessus pour trouver des images grâce à la boîte de recherche
Use your private key backup to migrate y: Use your private key backup to migrate your account. You can import your private key backup at the Settings page in Idena Desktop app.
Wait for validation end: Patientez la fin de la validation
Waiting for prolongation or termination: En attente de la prolongation ou de la termination
Waiting for refunds: En attente de la restitution des fonds
Waiting for refunds or termination: En attente de la restitution des fonds ou de la termination
Waiting for rewards distribution: En attente de la distribution des récompenses
Waiting for rewards distribution or term: En attente de la distribution des récompenses ou de la termination
Welcome to qualification session: Bienvenue à la session de qualification
Why do I need the training?: Why do I need the training?
You are invited to join the upcoming val: You are invited to join the upcoming validation. Please accept the invitation.
You can also submit optional flips if yo: Vous pouvez aussi soumettre {{remainingOptionalFlips}} des flips optionnels si vous le souhaitez.
You can disable delegation at the next e: You can disable delegation at the next epoch only
You can disable delegation at the next epoch only.
You can issue the invitation to the spec: Vous pouvez générer l'invitation pour l'adresse d'une identité spécifique dans la section Avancé
You can lose your stake, all your mining: You can lose your stake, all your mining and validation rewards if you delegate your mining status.
You can not submit flips. Please get val: Vous ne pouvez soumettre de flips. Veuillez être validé d'abord
You can run your own node at your deskto: You can run your own node at your desktop computer.
You can use all functions of the app exc: You can use all functions of the app except validation. Please connect to a shared node if you want to participate in the upcoming validation using the web app.
You cannot use the shared node for the u: You cannot use the shared node for the upcoming validation ceremony.
You don't have any pending transactions: You don't have any pending transactions yet
You don't have any transactions yet: Vous n’avez aucune transaction pour le moment
You had to report this flip: You had to report this flip
You have been invited to join the upcomi: You have been invited to join the upcoming validation ceremony. Click the button below to accept the invitation.
You haven't submitted your answers in ti: You haven't submitted your answers in time. This validation session is over.
Vous n’avez pas encore sélectionné de contacts
You marked this flip as correct: You marked this flip as correct
You may lose rewards. Are you sure?: Vous pourriez perdre des récompenses. Êtes-vous sûr ?
You must either choose start date or sta: Vous devez choisir entre une date de départ ou un commencement immédiat
You must provide at least 2 options: Vous devez mettre au moins 2 options de vote
You must provide valid URL including pro: Vous devez fournir un URL valide comprenant la version du protocole
You must specify your own identity addre: Vous devez spécifier l'adresse de votre propre identité
You need to create at least 3 flips per:
You need to create at least 3 flips per epoch to participate
                    in the next validation ceremony. Follow step-by-step
                    instructions.
You need to get Verified status to be ab: Vous devez avoir le statut Vérifié pour pouvoir terminé votre identité et retirer votre stake
You need to get Verified status to get t: Vous devez avoir le statut Vérifié pour récupérer les fonds vérouillés dans votre portefeuille principal
You will get {{invitationRewardRatio}} o: You will get {{invitationRewardRatio}} of the invitation rewards if your invite is activated now
You'll get rewarded for every successful: You'll get rewarded for every successfully qualified flip.
Your answers for the validation session: Vos réponses pour la session de validation ont été soumises avec succès!
Your invitation code has been generated: Your invitation code has been generated successfully!
Votre node a été hors ligne plus d’une heure. Une pénalité sera infligée automatiquement. Vous pourrez reprendre le minage une fois la pénalité intégralement payée.
Your vote is secret. To reveal your vote: Your vote is secret. To reveal your vote please appear online and send the scheduled transaction during the counting period: {{startCounting}} — {{finishCounting}}
You’re about to send iDNA from your wall: Vous êtes sur le point d'envoyer des iDNA depuis votre portefeuille à l'adresse suivante
You’re about to sign and send tx from yo: Vous êtes sur le point de signer en envoyer une transaction depuis votre portefeuille

joinIdenaDiscord: Join <2>Idena Community Discord</2> and request an invitation code from the community in #invite-requests channel.
joinIdenaReddit: Join <2>Idena subreddit</2> and request an invitation code from the community.
joinIdenaTelegram: Join the official <2>Idena Telegram group</2> and request an invitation code from the community.
joinIdenaTwitterGetCode: Enter your twitter name and click <2>Get an invitation code</2> button. The code will be shown automatically.
joinIdenaTwitterSendTweet: <0>Send a tweet</0> with a hashtag #IdenaInvite from your account. To get an invite, your account should be older than 1 year or older than two months and have at least 50 followers. The tweet should say:
onboardingValidateSubscribe: <0>Inscrivez-vous</0> aux annonces Idena (seulement des annonces importantes)
reviewMissingFlips: Vous avez besoin de répondre à <2>all flips</2> sinon vous risquez de rater la validation.
reviewMissingReports: Pour avoir le maximum de récompenses utilisez vos <2>all available reports</2> pour les pires flips.
